text: Montegrotto Terme is a comune in the Province of Padua in the Veneto region in Italy. It is a famous spa town. It is east of the Euganean Hills. Padua is about to the north. Venice is about away. Montegrotto Terme has had baths at least since Ancient Roman times. == References == Category:Settlements in Padua Category:Spa towns in Italy
title: Montegrotto Terme
